title: Deep Learning Approaches in Medical Image Analysis
author: Dr. Afsana Rahman
address: Ragib Nagar, South Surma, Sylhet-3112, Bangladesh
abstract: This research provides a comprehensive review of deep learning models and their application in medical image analysis, emphasizing improved diagnostics.
methodology: The study uses a comparative analysis of CNN and GAN architectures across several open-source medical datasets.
fundingInfo: Funded by IEEE Bangladesh Section and Leading University Research Cell.

title: 5G Network Optimization Using Machine Learning
author: Md. Rizwan Karim
address: Ragib Nagar, South Surma, Sylhet-3112, Bangladesh
abstract: This paper explores how machine learning algorithms can optimize performance and reduce latency in 5G networks.
methodology: A simulation-based approach using NS-3 and TensorFlow to test adaptive routing and bandwidth allocation strategies.
fundingInfo: Partially funded by Huawei R&D Lab, Dhaka.
